page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Most of the {collieries}in this area are closing,leaving many unemployed. Few new jobs are being created.At present many work in shops,schools, pensioners 'homes and pubs.{Wath}has a main shopping centre and 2 garages; {Brampton}has 4 take away,8 food shops,4 non food shops,a D.I.Y. store 2 garages ,a betting shop and 3 pubs.Some of the land is taken up by {Cortonwood mine}and the rest by farming.A survey of 187 people showed 72{different types of jobs,}the majority being miners.The most unusual job is a{phlebotomist}who takes blood samples.There were 27 in {manufacturing}such as joinery;2 in {transport} such as lorry driving; 37 in{service}jobs such as nursing and the fire service;5 in{office}jobs such as secretary work and typing; and in{construction}such as building.
